project.description: Deploy vm on qa hw. Setup rally envirment. Run test Mandatory parameter: hw_number <!-- Managed by Jenkins Job Builder -->

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hw_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mandatory, number of the QA cloud server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: image_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Pre condition to have jeos image uploaded before running rally tests

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; scenario name which typically is an integer with a single letter

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_job_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; name of the scenario jenkins job that is used to trigger this job

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_build_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; scenario build number that triggered this job

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: rally_server
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Server hostname where rally is setup

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -x # Create artifacts dir export artifacts_dir=$WORKSPACE/.artifacts rm -rf $artifacts_dir mkdir -p $artifacts_dir touch $artifacts_dir/.ignore
admin=crowbar$hw_number cloud=qa$hw_number
export rally_server=$rally_server export image_name=$image_name
scp root@$admin:/root/scripts/jenkins-support.sh . source jenkins-support.sh connect_rally_server_run_test ret=$? # Archive artifacts on rally server buildnumber=${BUILD_NUMBER} ssh -T root@$rally_server "bash -s $buildnumber" <<'EOF' buildnumber=$1 mkdir -p /root/rally-results-backup/$buildnumber cp /root/results/* /root/rally-results-backup/$buildnumber/ EOF # Copy test run results output to jenkins artifacts scp root@$rally_server:/root/results/* $artifacts_dir exit $ret
